Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Information Systems Security Officer ISSO KBRwyle January 2018 to Present Assists in the oversight of daytoday operations of information system security in accordance with Defense Security Service DSS and Department of Defense DoD requirements Oversees hardware and software implementation on classified information systems Assists users and transitioning to the new DSS required Risk Management Framework RMF Develops and maintains core documentation such as System Security Plans SSP Risk Assessment Reports RAR Security Assessment
